title: Splash screen: rename to “GALAXY INTERNET” and add galaxy image background behind name

requirements.summary: Change splash screen headline text to exactly “GALAXY INTERNET” while preserving all existing splash behaviors.
acceptanceCriteria: On app launch, the splash screen headline text reads exactly "GALAXY INTERNET".
No other branding text is shown in place of the company name on the splash screen.
Existing splash behaviors remain unchanged: auto-transition timing, fade-out, click/tap to skip, and reduced-motion support.

file_operations.description: Replace the current company name string with the exact text "GALAXY INTERNET" (and remove/adjust any related comment) without changing existing timing, fade-out, click-to-skip, Skip button behavior, or reduced-motion handling.

requirements.summary: Add a static galaxy background image behind the splash screen company-name area and ensure readable contrast across breakpoints.
acceptanceCriteria: A galaxy image is used as a background behind the company-name area (not just a flat gradient).
The "GALAXY INTERNET" text remains clearly legible on top of the galaxy image on mobile and desktop.
Reduced-motion mode still shows a minimal/non-animated variant and still transitions quickly (no animation required for the galaxy image itself).
The galaxy background image is served as a static asset from `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and is not fetched from the backend.

file_operations.description: Add the required static galaxy background image asset to be used for the splash screen company-name area: frontend/public/assets/generated/smgi-galaxy-name-bg.dim_1920x1080.png.

Wrap the headline block in a dedicated 'company-name area' container that uses the static galaxy background image (from frontend/public/assets/generated/smgi-galaxy-name-bg.dim_1920x1080.png) behind the text, and add appropriate layering/overlay (e.g., dark scrim) so the title remains readable on mobile/desktop. Ensure reduced-motion mode does not introduce additional animations for this background.

requirements.summary: Integrate the galaxy name-area background into existing splash styling without altering layout, fade-out, or Skip button behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The splash screen still fades out when completing.
The Skip button still works and remains readable/usable on top of the updated design.
No backend changes are introduced for this update.

file_operations.description: Add/adjust splash-specific CSS classes to support the name-area galaxy background (using frontend/public/assets/generated/smgi-galaxy-name-bg.dim_1920x1080.png) and ensure sufficient contrast (e.g., overlay/scrim, border-radius, padding) across breakpoints while leaving existing global splash behaviors (fade-out, reduced-motion) unchanged.

Update Tailwind classes/structure to apply the new name-area background styling and maintain existing layout, z-index layering, and Skip button readability/interaction (no changes to the underlying completion/skip logic).
